statements: SELECT * FROM EmailCampaignConversion;
SELECT email_campaign_name, conversion_type FROM EmailCampaignConversion WHERE conversion_type = 'sales';
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaignConversion ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT email_campaign_name, conversion_value FROM EmailCampaignConversion WHERE conversion_value > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, email_campaign_name, conversion_date FROM EmailCampaignConversion WHERE conversion_type = 'signup' ORDER BY email_campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaignConversion ORDER BY conversion_date DESC, conversion_value ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT campaign_id, email_campaign_name, conversion_type, conversion_value FROM EmailCampaignConversion WHERE conversion_type = 'purchase' AND conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT email_campaign_name, SUM(conversion_value) AS total_conversion_value FROM EmailCampaignConversion GROUP BY email_campaign_name ORDER BY total_conversion_value DESC
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaignConversion WHERE conversion_type LIKE '%sale%' AND conversion_value > 1000
SELECT campaign_id, email_campaign_name FROM EmailCampaignConversion WHERE conversion_date = (SELECT MAX(conversion_date) FROM EmailCampaignConversion)
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT * FROM campaign_conversions WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT conversion_id, conversion_type, revenue FROM campaign_conversions WHERE conversion_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_conversions FROM email_campaigns JOIN campaign_conversions ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_conversions.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, conversion_type, revenue FROM email_campaigns JOIN campaign_conversions ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_conversions.campaign_id WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, revenue FROM email_campaigns LEFT JOIN campaign_conversions ON campaign_conversions.campaign_id = email_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE conversion_date IS NOT NULL AND conversion_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM conversions
SELECT sale_date, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM sales WHERE sale_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM conversions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT c.campaign_name, s.product_id, s.quantity FROM email_campaigns c JOIN sales s ON c.campaign_id = s.campaign_id;
SELECT id, email_campaign_id, conversion_type, conversion_date, conversion_amount FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, sale_amount, attribution_date FROM sales_attributions WHERE sale_amount > 10000 AND attribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%summer%' AND end_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT id, roi, calculation_date FROM campaign_roi ORDER BY calculation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY conversion_date DESC, conversion_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM email_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT cr.email_campaign_id, cr.conversion_type, sa.sale_amount FROM conversion_rates cr INNER JOIN sales_attributions sa ON cr.email_campaign_id = sa.email_campaign_id WHERE cr.conversion_amount > 500 AND sa.sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY cr.conversion_amount DESC, sa.sale_amount DESC;
SELECT ec.campaign_name, ca.roi FROM email_campaigns ec INNER JOIN campaign_roi ca ON ca.email_campaign_id = ec.id WHERE ca.calculation_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY ca.roi DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(amount) AS total_conversion_amount FROM conversions GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(open_rate) AS avg_open_rate, AVG(click_rate) AS avg_click_rate FROM campaign_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT conversion_id, campaign_id, conversion_date, amount FROM conversions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT c.customer_name, e.campaign_name, e.start_date, s.amount FROM customers c JOIN email_campaigns e ON c.customer_id = e.campaign_id JOIN sales s ON s.campaign_id = e.campaign_id;
